copyLinksAsText.title: Copy Links as Text
copyLinksAsText.desc: Copy only the title / alt of the links, not the URL (removing all brackets and parentheses).

removeFootnotesLinks.title: Remove Footnotes contents
removeFootnotesLinks.desc: Remove the number/meaning in footnotes when selected.
removeFootnotesLinks.keep: Keep all links formatting and contents
removeFootnotesLinks.remove: Remove all links formatting and contents
removeFootnotesLinks.format: Remove all links formatting but keep contents as [^1]
